text: The Yidgha are a Iranic people living in Chitral District. They number around 9,600 and speak the Yidgha language. They follow Shia Islam.https://www.peoplegroups.org/explore/GroupDetails.aspx?peid=46996 ==References== Category:Ethnic groups in Khyber Pakhtunkhwa Category:Chitral District
title: Yidgha people
